ingredients.ingredient: 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, or as needed

cookingTips: Poke holes in potatoes before baking to prevent bursting
Rub with oil before baking for better browning and texture
Add brown sugar and butter immediately after removing from oven while still hot
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook on basic sweet potato preparation and timing for a perfect soft interior, and suggest topping application for best flavor.
